title: Lincoln Home National Historic Site: Research
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Research               Research        Fritz Klein as Abraham Lincoln in Lincoln Home National Historic Site's 2007 film "Abraham Lincoln: A Journey to Greatness." NPS Image   Â    Click here for information on the "George L. Painter Looking for Lincoln Lectures," an annual February 12 tradition at Lincoln Home National Historic Site. Click here for information on the "Annual Lincoln Colloquium," a program where scholars come together to share their insights on the life and times of Abraham Lincoln.
